content:
var Name = prompt("Please enter your name:")
document.write("<p><center>" + Name.fontsize(8) + ", Welcome to play Paper Scissors Rock game!".fontsize(8) + "</center></p>")

$(function(){

var computerScore=0,
  playerScore=0;

function setText(txt){
$("#playerScore").text(playerScore);
$("#computerScore").text(computerScore);
$("#result").text(txt);
}

function makeComputerChoice(){
  var computerChoice = "";
  var r = Math.random();
  if (r < .34) {
    computerChoice = "rock";
  } else if (r < .76) {
    computerChoice = "paper";
  } else {
    computerChoice = "scissors";   
  };
  return computerChoice;
 }
